data.title: Takuya Sato
data.meta_description: Takuya Sato  (佐藤 拓也, Satō Takuya) is a Japanese voice actor and singer who voices Caesar Anthonio Zeppeli in the first season of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Animation.
data.text:
is a Japanese voice actor and singer who voices Caesar Anthonio Zeppeli in the first season of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Animation.

He is also well known for his roles as Toshiki Kai in Cardfight!! Vanguard, Yu Kanda in D.Gray-man Hallow, Vroon in Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger, Bill Weasley in the Japanese dub of Harry Potter and the superhero Kick-Ass in the Japanese dub of Kick-Ass.

Biography

Sato was born on May 19, 1984, in Miyagi Prefecture, Japan. He graduated from the voice actor vocal department of Tokyo Seiyu Academy and is currently a 7th generation member of the Japanese talent agency, Ken Production.[4] He announced on his blog in January 2013 that he was married.[5]

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Roles

Trivia

Sato's favorite character other than his own was Wamuu. He appreciated Wamuu's straightforward attitude toward combat and morality.[6]

The scene Sato remembers the most was in Episode 20 when Joseph searched for Caesar's body under the rubble and Lisa Lisa began crying.[6]

Sato struggled the most voicing Caesar when the character was flirting with a female as Sato himself found it embarrassing.[6]

Sato's favorite characters in Stardust Crusaders are Oingo and Boingo.[7]
